    • Method Detail

      • collectAndReceive

        public void collectAndReceive(java.lang.String requestId,
                              io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject feature,
                              io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<CollectorJobResult>> resultHandler)
        Description copied from interface: DataCollectorService
        This method triggers a CollectorJob and receives the CollectorJobResult in the passed result handler. If the queue of the DataCollectorServiceVerticle is already full, the response will be a failed AsyncResult with the message which is specified in DataCollectorService.ERROR_QUEUE_LIMIT_REACHED.
        Specified by:
        collectAndReceive in interface DataCollectorService
        Parameters:
        requestId - A request id to identify the collection request.
        feature - A JSON object to pass attributes and properties which are needed for the collection process.
        resultHandler - A handler to process the result.

      • collect

        public void collect(java.lang.String requestId,
                    io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject feature,
                    io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<java.lang.Void>> resultHandler)
        Description copied from interface: DataCollectorService
        This method is doing the same as DataCollectorService.collectAndReceive(String, JsonObject, Handler), but will not send back the result. It will just send back the information if the job succeeded or failed.
        Specified by:
        collect in interface DataCollectorService
        Parameters:
        requestId - A request id to identify the collection request.
        feature - A JSON object to pass attributes and properties which are needed for the collection process.
        resultHandler - A handler to process the result.

      • getMetricsSnapshot

        public void getMetricsSnapshot(io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject>> resultHandler)
        Description copied from interface: DataCollectorService
        Returns a JsonObject which contains a current snapshot of the metrics. The JsonObject has more or less the following structure: 
         {
   total: {
     jobs: {
       count: 123,
       failed: 12,
       succeeded: 108,
       exception: 3
     },
     quality: {
       complete: 90,
       partial: 20,
       ....
     },
     errors: {
       blocked: 90,
       timeout: 20,
       ....
     }
   },
   queue: {
     maxSize: 30,
     free: 12,
     occupied: 18
   }
 }

        Specified by:
        getMetricsSnapshot in interface DataCollectorService
        Parameters:
        resultHandler - A handler to process the metrics result.

      • close

        public void close()
        Description copied from interface: DataCollectorService
        Is needed for the proxy generation
        Specified by:
        close in interface DataCollectorService
